credits.value: The Juniper SIRT would like to acknowledge and thank watchtowr for responsibly reporting this vulnerability.

supportingMedia.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

exploit.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

description.value: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')

supportingMedia.value:
The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue: 20.4R3-S10*, 21.2R3-S8*, 21.4R3-S6*, 22.1R3-S5*, 22.2R3-S3*, 22.3R3-S2*, 22.4R3-S1*, 23.2R2*, 23.4R2*, 24.2R1*, and all subsequent releases.

* Pending Publication

solution.value:
The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue: 20.4R3-S10*, 21.2R3-S8*, 21.4R3-S6*, 22.1R3-S5*, 22.2R3-S3*, 22.3R3-S2*, 22.4R3-S1*, 23.2R2*, 23.4R2*, 24.2R1*, and all subsequent releases.

* Pending Publication

supportingMedia.value: Disable J-Web, or limit access to only trusted hosts and users.

work_around.value: Disable J-Web, or limit access to only trusted hosts and users.

descriptions.value: Una vulnerabilidad de neutralización incorrecta de la entrada durante la generación de páginas web ('Cross-site Scripting') en J-Web de Juniper Networks Junos OS en las series SRX y EX permite a un atacante construir una URL que, cuando la visita otro usuario, le permite ejecutar comandos con los permisos del objetivo, incluido un administrador. Una invocación específica del método emit_debug_note en webauth_operation.php devolverá los datos que recibe. Este problema afecta a Juniper Networks Junos OS en las series SRX y EX: * Todas las versiones anteriores a 20.4R3-S10; * Versiones 21.2 anteriores a 21.2R3-S8; * Versiones 21.4 anteriores a 21.4R3-S6; * Versiones 22.1 anteriores a 22.1R3-S5; * Versiones 22.2 anteriores a 22.2R3-S3; * Versiones 22.3 anteriores a 22.3R3-S2; * Versiones 22.4 anteriores a 22.4R3-S1; * Versiones 23.2 anteriores a 23.2R2; * Versiones 23.4 anteriores a 23.4R2.
